display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
USB 虚拟串口 (VCP)
持续发送 JSON 数据流

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
HTTP/HTTPS 请求
- 获取实时/历史数据
- 发送控制/策略命令

div.style: stroke-width: 2px; stroke: orange; stroke-dasharray: 5px, 5px; display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
💻 STM32F411 (MicroPython)
- 非阻塞主循环 (select.poll)
- 传感器智能驱动 (降级策略)
- JSON 数据格式化
- 串口命令解析

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
📡 串口读取线程
- 监听 /dev/ttyACM0
- 解析 JSON
- 更新实时数据
- 存入数据库

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
🌿 自动灌溉线程
- 读取策略和数据
- 决策并发送指令

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
🗃️ SQLite 数据库 (db.py)
- sensor_data: 历史数据
- control_logs: 操作日志
- irrigation_policies: 灌溉策略
- users/roles: 用户权限
- ... (共7张表 + 触发器)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
📱 用户设备 (PC/手机)
- Web 浏览器

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
☁️ MQTT Broker (未来扩展)
- 实现云端通信
- 支持移动App
